lead_paragraph: The eighth annual gala raises nearly $2 million for AIDS research and victims of the recent earthquake in central Italy.

headline.print_headline: Fashion Turns Out to Support AIDS Research
headline.main: In Milan, Fashion Turns Out to Support amfAR

snippet: The eighth annual gala raises nearly $2 million for AIDS research and victims of the recent earthquake in central Italy....
abstract: European glitterati gather at eighth annual amfAR Milano gala to celebrate and raise money to benefit AIDS research.
